# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This item is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled benefits. I am confident it will exceed your expectations. For this unique opportunity, I am offering it to you for $150. I believe this price reflects its quality and the value it brings. Please let me know if you're interested in making this investment in excellence. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
